name: Cartridge Brewing
description: Located in the historic Peters Cartridge Factory, minutes from Kings Island and right alongside the Little Miami River and bike trail, Cartridge Brewing is a 15BBL brewhouse and upscale brewpub – which means award-winning craft beer alongside elevated pub fare and curated cocktails from its full-service kitchen and bar. With beer brewed on-site in the same landmark where ammunition was made in support of both World Wars, Cartridge Brewing has helped to restore their home to its former glory as a gathering place for the community.
